m_szDocSumamry: dateText -------------------- Tuesday, October 27, 2015  Monday, October 05, 2015  September 2016  textArticle -------------------- Broader Perspective  Ideas from  Philosopher  , Economic Theorist,  Blockchain Scholar  ,  DIYbio Innovator  , and Startup Founder  Melanie Swan  regarding the hope and potentiality of our future  Tuesday, October 27, 2015  Crypto Enlightenment: A Social Theory of Blockchains  There is something new and fundamental happening in the world which could be the start of the next enlightenment period. The core of this is shifting from centralized to decentralized models
